p: The estimated costs of dealing with autoimmune diseases in the USA, where it has been studied more than in Europe, are over $100 billion, an underestimate since the eight most common autoimmune diseases alone account for between $51.8 and $70.6 billion/year [ 125]. Moreover, the chronic pain state and the disability to make changes in the mood of patients, sleeping disorders, and tiredness impact their social and working life [ 108].
